settings.section.body.body.title: Settings
settings.section.email.settings.body.tex: The exported zip file will have this version number.
settings.section.email.main.body.title: E-mail
settings.section.email.main.body.text:
At the settings tab you can configure the e-mail settings.
These settings are the mail server settings.
If you don't provide the e-mail configuration, the system isn't capable of sending e-mails.
settings.section.export.settings.body.te: The exported zip file will have this version number.
settings.section.export.export.body.text: Export the entire project as zip file here.
system.update.section.main.body.text: You can choose to update the OS manually or wait for the automatic update process.
It is scheduled once a week on saturday at 10:00 in the morning.
user.blocked:

Please try again later...
